name: ILCorePractitioner
title: ILCore Practitioner Profile
description: Israel Core proposed constraints and extensions on the Practitioner Resource

element.definition: Definitions for the profile-practitioner resource profile.

element.short: The value that is unique within the system.
Israeli Ministry of Health practitioner license
element.definition: Israeli Ministry of Health medical practitioner license. [MoH practitioner portal](https://practitioners.health.gov.il/Practitioners) Note: Should include the profession-code, a dash (-) and a sequence number. I.e., \-\ where profession-code is a value of PractitionerProfessionMoH

example.label: valid Israeli Pracitioner Licence number example

element.short: Israeli Ministry of Health Practitioner License

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL have a number, followed by a hyphen ("-") and followed by another number

element.definition: Israeli MoH Nurse license. MoH practitioner portal -  [https://practitioners.health.gov.il/Nurses](https://practitioners.health.gov.il/Nurses)

example.label: valid Israeli Nurse registration number example

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL be a number with digits only

element.short: Israeli Ministry of Welfare and Social Affairs socal-worker's license
element.definition: Israeli Ministry of Welfare and Social Affairs socal-worker's license. [MOLSA social-worker's registry](https://data.gov.il/dataset/social-workers-registration)

element.short: Israeli Ministry of Welfare and Social Affairs socal-worker's License

element.definition: Israeli ID number (9 digit unchangeable number, including leading zeros and includes a control digit), including temporarily identification numbers assigned by Israeli National Insurance

constraint.human: Israeli ID must be 9-digits with a correct check-digit at the end.
constraint.expression:
matches('[0-9]{9}') and
substring(8,1).toInteger()=
(10-((substring(0,1).toInteger() +
substring(1,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 +
substring(1,1).toInteger()*2 div 10 +
substring(2,1).toInteger() +
substring(3,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 +
substring(3,1).toInteger()*2 div 10 +
substring(4,1).toInteger() +
substring(5,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 +
substring(5,1).toInteger()*2 div 10 +
substring(6,1).toInteger() +
substring(7,1).toInteger()*2 mod 10 +
substring(7,1).toInteger()*2 div 10) mod 10)) mod 10

element.definition: Temporary practitioner license issued by Israeli Ministry of Health Note: identifier (מספר רישיון זמני למקצועות הבריאות) is mandatory and SHOULD include the profession-code, a dash (-) and a sequence number. I.e., \-\ where profession-code is a value of PractitionerProfessionMoH

example.label: valid Israeli Pracitioner certitificate number example
valid Israeli Pracitioner certitificate number example

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL have a number, followed by a hyphen ("-") and followed by another number

element.definition: Permanent practitioner license issued by Israeli Ministry of Health Note: identifier (מספר רישיון קבוע למקצועות הבריאות) is mandatory and SHOULD include the profession-code, a dash (-) and a sequence number. I.e., \-\ where profession-code is a value of PractitionerProfessionMoH

example.label: valid Israeli Pracitioner certitificate number example
valid Israeli Pracitioner certitificate number example

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL have a number, followed by a hyphen ("-") and followed by another number

element.definition: Practitioner expertise certificate issued by Israeli Ministry of Health. Note: Practitioner: identifier (מספר תעודת מומחה למקצועות הבריאות) is not mandatory and if exists, SHOULD be a sequence number only. I.e, \ Nurse: identifier (מספר תעודת מומחה למקצועות הסיעוד) is not mandatory and if exists, SHOULD include the expertise-code, a dash (-) and a sequence number. I.e, \-\ where expertise-code is a value of PractitionerExpertiseMoH

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL be a number with digits only
identifier.value in this slice SHALL have a number, followed by a hyphen ("-") and followed by another number

element.definition:
The slice is used for temporary licenses (temporary permit to practice nursing) for nurses only.
 
<mark>Note:</mark> identifier  (מספר רישיון זמני למקצועות הסיעוד) is mandatory and SHOULD be a sequence number only. I.e., \<temporary-permit-certificate-number\>

example.label: Valid nurse registration certificate number example
Valid nurse registration certificate number example

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL be a number with digits only

element.definition: The slice is used for permanent licenses (permanent registration certificate to practice nursing) for nurses only. Note: identifier (מספר רישיון קבוע למקצועות הסיעוד) is mandatory and SHOULD be a sequence number only. I.e., \

example.label: Valid nurse registration certificate number example
Valid nurse registration certificate number example

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL be a number with digits only

element.definition: The slice is used for advanced course certifications (by healthcare specialty) for nurses only. Note: identifier (מספר תעודת קורס על בסיסי למקצועות הסיעוד) is not mandatory and if exists, SHOULD include the advanced-course-code, a dash (-) and permanent-registration-certificate-number (nurse license-number as the moh-nurse-registration-certificate identifier) - where advanced-course-code is a value from PractitionerAdvancedCourseMoH. It means the identifier for different advanced course certificates for the same nurse will not be unique, but the practice-code will show the difference between them.

example.label: Valid Nurse advanced course certifiaction number

element.short: Israeli MoH nurse advanced course certificate URI

example.label: Valid Nurse advanced course certifiaction number

constraint.human: identifier.value in this slice SHALL have a number, followed by a hyphen ("-") and followed by another number
